message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm being generous!
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but don't get too comfortable!
You're getting desperate, I can tell
I'm trying to make a comeback, don't underestimate me!
You're getting closer, but still not good enough
I'm making a last-ditch effort, take it or leave it!
You're running out of chances, make it worth my while
This is my final offer, take it or leave it!
